Welcome to Hogan's Irish Pub, a traditional Irish family-owned establishment nestled in the heart of Historic Downtown Cocoa Village. Our pub is not just a place to enjoy food and drink—it's an authentic Irish experience steeped in history and hospitality. Many of the furnishings and antiques that adorn our space made the journey across the Atlantic from Ireland in 2012, bringing with them the spirit and charm of the Emerald Isle.
Originally opened in Cape Canaveral in 2012, Hogan's Irish Bar quickly became a beloved local spot. We were thrilled to reopen in Cocoa Village in May 2022, allowing us to once again share our family’s heritage with the community. Owned and operated by the Hogan Family from County Mayo, Ireland, we take pride in offering more than just Irish pub fare. Here, you’ll find a carefully curated selection of imported stouts and ales, fine Irish whiskeys, and a welcoming atmosphere that makes every visit memorable.
We invite you to join us at Hogan's Irish Pub, where the warmth of Irish hospitality awaits. Whether you're here for a pint, a meal, or simply to soak in the ambiance, we look forward to raising a glass with you. Sláinte!
—The Hogan Family

Looking for the perfect place to host your next celebration?
Hogan’s Irish Pub offers a warm, welcoming atmosphere with plenty of character—ideal for birthdays, corporate gatherings, holiday parties, and everything in between. Enjoy delicious pub fare, perfectly poured pints, and friendly service that’ll make your guests feel right at home. Whether you're planning an intimate get-together or a lively bash, our team will work with you to create a memorable event tailored to your needs.
Book your private event today and let Hogan’s be the heart of your next great memory!
Inquire Now
